FuncDef: The user-group command creates a user group or displays the user group view. The undo user-group command deletes a user group. By default, the device has four built-in user groups: manage-ug, system-ug, monitor-ug, and visit-ug.

ParaDef.Info:
Name of a user group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters. Spaces and Chinese characters are not supported. The value cannot contain the following characters: \ / : < > | * " ?.
